job_description: software engineering job for the role Software Developer Internship 2026

• 2+ years of professional work experience, preferably in the non-profit sector or software industry.
• Experience working in a fast-paced, agile company.
• Previous sales experience preferred.
• Previous Salesforce Admin Experience preferred.
• Provide customer feedback to the product management and engineering teams to capture new customer requirements and improvements.
• Strong leadership, presentation and collaboration skills.
• Solid verbal, written, presentation and interpersonal communication skills.
• Proven time management & prioritization skills in a dynamic sales environment.

• Collaborate with business analysts and product managers to clarify requirements.
• Experience with Python, JavaScript, Node.
• Knowledge of web fundamentals (HTML5, CSS3), responsive layouts, accessibility, and performance optimization (e.
• Familiarity with the software development lifecycle, coding standards, source control, and build pipelines.
• Ability to solve straightforward problems with guidance and work independently on assigned tasks.
• Familiarity with Docker, cloud platforms (AWS/Azure/GCP), and observability tools.
• NET) in team projects.
• For front-end focused candidates: proficiency in TypeScript and React.
